topic.title: Sample: Simple map
topic.shortdesc: This sample demonstrates topic hierarchies and collections in a simple map. It can be found with accompanying content in samples\simplemap\source\simplemap.ditamap

body.codeblock: <map title="Simple map"> <topicref href="simple.dita" collection-type="sequence"> <topicref href="child1.dita"/> <topicref href="child2.dita" collection-type="family"> <topicref href="child2a.dita"/> <topicref href="child2b.dita"/> <topicref href="child3.dita"/> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Second instance of child3" href="child3.dita" locktitle="yes"> <topicmeta> <linktext>Link to child3 (second instance)</linktext> <shortdesc>A short description of child3 (second instance) </shortdesc> </topicmeta> </topicref> </topicref> </map>
